positions.description: Headed the portfolio of Public Relations and EAD-LSM Coordinator while being in charge of training 94 associate members- Responsible for heading event management, and the publicity of Entrepreneurship Awareness Drive and Local Startup Meet (1st offline edition post-Covid-19), which is a month-long flagship initiative of E-Cell.- Oversaw the conduction of 21 Pan India drives for EAD and pitching sessions encompassing 1500 startups and 100 investors across LSM.- Led to year-on-year growth of 150% in the number of attendees and increased the number of cities to 33 from 21 in the last offline edition of EAD-LSM.- GES 2023 witnessed the highest (Offline) participation in terms of the number of colleges, individual student participations, and startups reached, with an increase of 15% from the last offline edition.
positions.title: Senior Manager - EAD/LSM Coordinator | Public Relations
positions.description_html:
Headed the portfolio of Public Relations and EAD-LSM Coordinator while being in charge of training 94 associate members
- Responsible for heading event management, and the publicity of Entrepreneurship Awareness Drive and Local Startup Meet (1st offline edition post-Covid-19), which is a month-long flagship initiative of E-Cell.
- Oversaw the conduction of 21 Pan India drives for EAD and pitching sessions encompassing 1500 startups and 100 investors across LSM.
- Led to year-on-year growth of 150% in the number of attendees and increased the number of cities to 33 from 21 in the last offline edition of EAD-LSM.
- GES 2023 witnessed the highest (Offline) participation in terms of the number of colleges, individual student participations, and startups reached, with an increase of 15% from the last offline edition.

positions.subtitle: Entrepreneurship Cell, IIT Kharagpur
positions.description: - Publicity Head: Led a team of 90 GES Interns to publicize and market the online edition of the Global Entrepreneurship Summit 2022 through numerous newspaper articles, social media pages, and other organizations throughout the country to get the participation number of 2000+ students, professors, startups, and professionals.- Conducted the online edition of 'Connect The Dots' - a conference of 15+ E-Cells from various parts of the country to develop better communication and discuss common ground problems under GES 2022.- Managed a team of 500+ GES and campus ambassadors to ensure a nationwide diverse audience from 250+ colleges.- Events Team: Organized multiple events from scratch in tracks such as Entrepreneurial Finance, Gaming & Web3, metaverse, etc within GES 2022.- Startups & Alumni Relations Team: Throughout the year, continuously helped in providing funding, mentoring, and incubation to 50+ startup co-founders from the IIT Kharagpur campus and alumni startups.
